headline: A Look At Assurant (AIZ) Valuation After Recent Share Price Consolidation
summary: Assurant stock performance and recent context Assurant (AIZ) has drawn attention after recent trading left the shares at a last close of US$232.75, with returns over the past month, past 3 months and year showing a mixed picture for investors. See our latest analysis for Assurant. While the share price has eased slightly in the past month, the 90 day share price return of 10.74% and one year total shareholder return of 12.74% sit alongside a much stronger 3 and 5 year total shareholder return...
